short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Loads all the YouTube replies with 1 click on View Replies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube now loads comments 10 or so at a time, which is very annoying with a long list of replies. This extension will click for you so it loads all the replies until there are none left
